statements: SELECT * FROM SurveyData;
SELECT respondent_id, question_id, response FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_id = 5;
SELECT survey_id, response, timestamp FROM SurveyData WHERE respondent_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM SurveyData WHERE question_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT question_id, response FROM SurveyData WHERE respondent_id = 7 ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT question_id, COUNT(*) as total_responses FROM SurveyData GROUP BY question_id ORDER BY total_responses DESC
SELECT respondent_id, AVG(CAST(response AS INT)) as average_response FROM SurveyData WHERE question_id = 1 GROUP BY respondent_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ORDER BY average_response DESC
SELECT DISTINCT respondent_id, question_id FROM SurveyData WHERE response LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY respondent_id, question_id ASC
SELECT question_id, COUNT(*) as total_responses, MAX(timestamp) as latest_response_time FROM SurveyData GROUP BY question_id ORDER BY question_id ASC
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE survey_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT survey_name, respondent_id, response FROM surveys WHERE question_id = 1
SELECT * FROM respondents WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY respondent_name DESC
SELECT respondent_name, gender, location FROM respondents WHERE occupation = 'Engineer'
SELECT survey_name, question_id, response FROM surveys WHERE respondent_id = 5
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT survey_name, respondent_name FROM surveys s JOIN respondents r ON s.respondent_id = r.id
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM respondents
SELECT respondent_name, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM respondents r JOIN surveys s ON r.id = s.respondent_id GROUP BY respondent_name
SELECT survey_name, response FROM surveys WHERE question_id = 1 ORDER BY survey_date DESC
SELECT * FROM survey_participants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM survey_participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, participant_age FROM survey_participants ORDER BY participant_age DESC;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM survey_questions WHERE question_type = 'multiple choice';
SELECT participant_name, response_value FROM survey_participants JOIN survey_responses ON survey_participants.participant_id = survey_responses.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_participants WHERE participant_age > 30 ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_gender FROM survey_participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Male';
SELECT question_text, COUNT(response_id) AS response_count FROM survey_responses LEFT JOIN survey_questions ON survey_responses.question_id = survey_questions.question_id GROUP BY question_text;

SELECT participant_name, participant_age, question_text, response_value FROM survey_participants JOIN survey_responses ON survey_participants.participant_id = survey_responses.participant_id JOIN survey_questions ON survey_responses.question_id = survey_questions.question_id WHERE response_value = 'Agree';
SELECT MAX(participant_age) AS max_age, MIN(participant_age) AS min_age, AVG(participant_age) AS avg_age FROM survey_participants;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT respondent_name FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 3;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM survey_results GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT response_text, respondent_name FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 2;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT survey_name, question_text, result_value FROM surveys JOIN survey_questions ON surveys.survey_id = survey_questions.survey_id JOIN survey_results ON survey_questions.question_id = survey_results.question_id ORDER BY result_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_id, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_name, start_date, end_date FROM Surveys ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT respondent_name, respondent_age, respondent_gender FROM Respondents WHERE respondent_age > 25 AND respondent_gender = 'Male';
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM Questions WHERE is_optional = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_name, start_date, end_date FROM Surveys ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT respondent_name, respondent_email FROM Respondents WHERE respondent_age > 30 AND respondent_gender = 'Female';
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM Questions WHERE question_category = 'Feedback' LIMIT 5;
SELECT response_id, response_text, response_date FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
